articles.title: Russia's Prigozhin admits interfering in U.S. elections - CTV News
articles.description: Russian businessman Yevgeny Prigozhin said on Monday he had interfered in U.S. elections and would continue doing so in future, the first such admission from a figure who has been formally implicated by Washington in efforts to influence American politics.
